entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:28 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
